name: Monsters of the Desert
description:
In 'Monsters of the Desert' the main character is a man who needs to survive in the desert monsters attacking you.

It is important to be able to survive the monsters, the beginning is a bit hard but after that it will be increasingly easier, you can compete with your friends to make a big score as becoming the best in the game.
Level 1 - The beginning is a little harder, but you must to kill small monsters to reach the boss.
Level 2 - And here just have to kill the monster boss.
Level 3 - Here was implemented a helpful trick, to activate the helpful trick you need to press key 'Q' and from the wall will come some big missiles that will kill all the monsters without the boss.
Level 4 - There are 2 bosses, one are blue and one are brown, you just have to kill the two bosses to pass the level.
Level 5 - There are 4 bosses, two are blue and two are brown, you just have to kill all monsters include bosses to pass the level.
